Languages.string: all languages known to its summoner

MonsterTrait.Name: Incorporeal Movement
MonsterTrait.Text: The avatar can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. It takes 5 (1d10) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

MonsterTrait.Name: Turning Immunity
MonsterTrait.Text: The avatar is immune to features that turn undead.

MonsterTrait.Name: Hit Points
MonsterTrait.Text: The Avatar of Death appears with hit points equal to half its summoner's maximum hit points.

MonsterAction.Name: Reaping Scythe
MonsterAction.Text: The avatar sweeps its spectral scythe through a creature within 5 feet of it, dealing 7 (1d8 + 3) slashing damage plus 4 (1d8) necrotic damage.
